title: Ticket #1816: when a daemon does not have UDP, advertise that fact
description: When using TCP_FORWARDING_HOST or WANT_UDP_COMMAND_SOCKET=False, daemons should advertise that they do not have a UDP port so that things connecting to them will know to use TCP.
